data.introduce: 航班经停信息查询服务可用于查询航班的经停城市、起降时间和机型，为代理人实现航班经停信息的实时查询提供了快捷、简便、高效的途径。
data.business: 查询航班的经停城市、起降时间和机型。当我们只知道航班号，想了解它的行程时，国内航空公司可以通过此接口查到。对应黑屏FF指令，航班经停信息查询（FF）查询指定日期和航班号的航班经停信息。
data.functions: 对应黑屏FF指令，航班经停信息查询（FF）查询指定日期和航班号的航班经停信息。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirBriefRQ","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"零售商信息","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"BJS191","description":"伪 城 市 代 码\n（ Office 代\n码）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"AirBrief","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Airline","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"航空公司信息","children":[{"name":"Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"MU","description":"航空公司代码","children":[]}]},{"name":"FlightNumber","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"航班号","children":[]},{"name":"DepartureDate","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"出发日期","children":[]}]}]}]
